price: Abubahiriza isezerano ry’Imana Allah ryo kuyisenga ari Imwe Rudende, ntibanadohoke kw’isezerano rishimangirwa cane mu nyigisho z’intumwa zose (za nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah);
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُوفُونَ بِعَهۡدِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَنقُضُونَ ٱلۡمِيثَٰقَ

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yūfūna biʿahdi al-lahi walā yanquḍūna al-mīthāqa
